name: Iwunor Christopher
story: I just wanted to talk about my experience with coding. It's been absolutely mind-blowing! I've discovered a whole new world of creativity and problem-solving. Coding has given me the ability to create websites, apps, . It's such a fulfilling and exciting journey, and I highly recommend giving it a try. Trust me, you won't regret it!

name: Solomon precious
story: Well, I joined flip to tech with high expectations and to be honest my expectations are being met. With flip to tech, learning is fun, interactive and very educative.

name: OWOEYE SHALOM
story: It's been so engaging ever since I joined. I like that the teacher is not so inconsiderate, in that he does a recap when people miss the class. He also intentionally ensures that everyone is carried along during the class. That, I like!

name: Ngozi Agnes Agwuuma
story: Have been a very intriguing experience, very conducive  atmosphere and good tutors . Very impactful excercise  and it worth the  pay.

name: Olayide Olakunle Sola
story: You guys do a really good job. I'm glad I decided to learn here. It's really great how easy the classes are to understand. I never have any problem at all.

name: Ifigbe Eniola
story: Flip tech has been technology educating, it's a place to learn coding, web design and development technically skills which will be useful in the modern age.

name: Ayokunle shalom
story: It's alright,Like I mean it's good and also beginner friendly.
